talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>I was anxious to talk to you when I was
alone before, but I've gotten over it.<sp:0:4:0>I'm going to practice my signature recipe
until it's so delicious, the voe can't resist!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>That reminds me, I wonder if the <clr:0000>cookbook<clr:ffff> from
the <clr:0000>cooking class <clr:ffff>is still there. Maybe I should
go and check.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0001:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Scare_00>Why is this voe trying to talk to me?! There's only
one thing to do.<sp:0:4:0>And that's to pretend not to notice him.<sp:0:4:0>If this is going to keep happening to me, I'd better
hurry and get to<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0002:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Unconscious_01>It's no use. I still can't look him in the eye.<sp:0:4:0>I've got to get to the<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff> so I can ask Ashai how to
talk to voe.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Heh, I never thought the day would come
when I could casually greet a voe.<sp:0:4:0>I owe it all to you. Sarq!
talk0010:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>I get the feeling that this voe is trying to have
a conversation with me.<sp:0:4:0>And I'm definitely not ready for that yet.<sp:0:4:0>I'll just...<sp:5:0:0>pretend not to notice him.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Heh! I'm in a good mood, so I don't mind
greeting you over and over again.
talk0011:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Unconscious_01>It's no use. I still can't look him in the eye.<sp:0:4:0>I'll have to ask Ashai what to do in this situation
tomorrow in<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Notice>You wouldn't happen to be looking for
a place to rest, would you?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Why don't you try Romah's inn?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>The spa plan feels incredible. You won't
regret springing for it.
talk0012:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Why? Why do they always come to talk to me
when I'm alone?!<sp:0:4:0>Uuugh... <sp:5:0:0>I should've gone to the <clr:0000>canteen<clr:ffff>
with Pritana.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease>I'm nowhere near ready to talk to a voe yet, so...<sp:0:4:0>Time to use the tried-and-true strategy of
pretending not to notice him.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd love to chat with you some more, but
I'm pretty sleepy.<sp:0:4:0>I'll see you tomorrow, OK?<sp:0:4:0>Oh, and if you're looking for a place to
rest, why not check in at Romah's inn?
talk0007: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Scare_00>A vâ€” <sp:5:0:0>A voe! There's one RIGHT HERE!<sp:0:4:0>I can't do this. <sp:5:1:0>I have to focus on the lesson.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Heh, it's no big deal for us to talk now.<sp:5:1:0>
My fear has melted away, thanks to you.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Sarq!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>I've been thinking about how else I can
boost my confidence.<sp:0:4:0>I've decided to work on perfecting my
signature recipe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>That reminds me, I wonder if the <clr:0000>cookbook<clr:ffff> from
the <clr:0000>cooking class on the surface<clr:ffff> is still there.
Maybe I'll go and practice one more time.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0008:
<snd:Sleep>The way to a voe's heart...<sp:5:0:0>is through
the stomach...<sp:5:0:0>
talk0009:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Unconscious_01>What's with this voe? Why's he keep looking at me?<sp:0:4:0>This is ruining my concentration. How am I supposed
to focus on the lesson now?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>I was anxious to talk to you when I was
alone before, but I've gotten over it.<sp:0:4:0>I'm going to practice my signature recipe
until it's so delicious, the voe can't resist!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>That reminds me, I wonder if the <clr:0000>cookbook<clr:ffff> from
the <clr:0000>cooking class on the surface<clr:ffff> is still there.
I'll have to check once the sand shroud is gone.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
